code: import React from'react';import{Heart,MessageCircle,User,Compass}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BottomNav=_ref=>{let{currentView,setView}=_ref;const navItems=[{id:'recommendations',label:'推荐',icon:Heart},{id:'discover',label:'发现',icon:Compass},{id:'messages',label:'消息',icon:MessageCircle},{id:'profile',label:'我的',icon:User}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"md:hidden fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white border-t border-gray-200 pb-safe pt-2 px-6 h-16 flex justify-between items-center z-50",children:navItems.map(item=>{const isActive=currentView===item.id||item.id==='profile'&&currentView==='edit-profile';const Icon=item.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setView(item.id),className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center space-y-1 w-16 transition-colors duration-200 ".concat(isActive?'text-rose-500':'text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{size:24,fill:isActive&&item.id==='recommendations'?"currentColor":"none",strokeWidth:isActive?2.5:2}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-[10px] font-medium",children:item.label})]},item.id);})});};export default BottomNav;
